candidate.notes: John is a very good candidate with 5 years of experience in Java, Spring, Hibernate, JPA, SQL, Cypress, Cucumber. He is a quick learner and has good communication skills.

vacancy.description: We are looking for a Trainee Software QA Engineer to join our team. The candidate should have experience in Java, Spring, JPA, SQL, Cypress, Cucumber. The candidate should be a quick learner and have good communication skills.
